titleStmt.title: Three sermons I. The wrath of God against sinners, II. God's eternitie, and mans humanitie, III. The plantation of the righteous / by T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.P. for Iohn Stafford, dwelling in Black- Horse-Alley neere Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Second and third sermons each have special t.p., continuous paging.
Reproduction of original in: Sion College. Library.
